version_description:
New Top Picks Section - News Bulletin & Promotional Offers Destination

Bug Fixes & Increased Stability

Minor bug fixes after the major release in version 3.0 which included:
• New easy-to-use navigation
• Now responsively designed
• Extra evening edition on phone as well as tablet
• Smaller file size – so quicker to download
• Daily video news digests
• Added new puzzles
• View and buy items added to your wishlist
• More news, sport, features and celebrity gossip than ever before!

We’ve made further improvements since our major 3.0.1 release:

- Each edition is now about half the filesize so will be quicker to download
- We’ve put a limit on the number of editions which your app stores so it doesn’t use up too much of your memory
- We’ve fixed a bug which meant an email pop up would appear too frequently in certain circumstances
- We’ve fixed a bug which meant a small number of users were not seeing the body text in some articles
- You can now easily change the font size by going to the settings menu from within an edition

We've made a few updates to your favourite free newspaper app including:

- you can now delete individual editions from the storefront. Just long press on the cover
- puzzles fix for iOS10
- improved edition download process
- various bug fixes and enhancements

We’ve made a few updates to your favourite free newspaper app.

Here’s some great improvements you’ll notice:

- Vastly reduced file sizes to save your memory
- Puzzle problems have been solved - fixed bugs stopping puzzles from loading
- Fixes to stop that annoying ‘Oops something went wrong’ message
- New indicator shows when you’re online
- PLUS a few other rogue errors kicked out of the app

- Improved manual download
- Offline/online error messaging fixed
- Auto-download error messaging fixed
- General big fixes

- Two great new puzzles added
- Improved unpacking of downloaded issues
- Improved error reporting
- General bug fixes

- Two great new puzzles added
- Improved unpacking of downloaded issues
- Improved error reporting
- General bug fixes
Now optimised for iPhone X. General bug fixes.

Thanks for using the Metro app. In this release we've issued some under the hood improvements.
If you encounter any problems in using the app please go to Settings and Contact Us.
If you're enjoying the app please leave a review!

Number of bugs squashed, including:

Screen sizing for puzzle section - no longer will content hide behind toolbar
Editions automatically deleted - most recent editions will now remain in your storefront unless YOU choose to delete
PLUS a few other rogue errors kicked out of the app

Thanks for using the Metro app. In this release we've issued some under the hood improvements.
If you encounter any problems in using the app please go to Settings and Contact Us.
If you're enjoying the app please leave a review!
Introducing the new Metro Saturday Puzzles, available via subscription only.
We’ve squashed a couple of little bugs
